summary: RE HID LIGHTS:  MY VISION IS IMPAIRED IN THE EVENING WHEN A CAR COMES ALONG WITH THE HIGH INTENSITY DISCHARGE LIGHTS.  FOR ME IT IS REALLY A VERY SERIOUS PROBLEM.  MY SAFE DRIVING IS ALSO AFFECTED WHEN HID HEADLIGHTS SHINE IN MY REAR VIEW MIRROR.  THEY ARE A SERIOUS SAFETY HAZARD FOR MANY OF US AND MIGHT ALREADY HAVE BEEN THE CAUSE OF ACCIDENTS.  *JB
